title: I got a LeaverBuster because the game wouldn't put me past the loading screen
body: I had just finished champ select and was in the loading screen to get in game. However, it wasn't showing any if the champion icons and i was just sitting there with a loading icon. Eventually the game closed and said that the game ended. I was pretty mad cause this has happened before and every time i have to fix the client, which seems to take my computer at least an hour or so. But i get to the post game stats and it announces to me that i have a leaver buster to being afk. That fricken pissed me off because it wasn't even my fault and i had no control of it. Fixing the client now seems to only temporarily solve the problem. I would really appreciate it if someone could tell me how to fix this so it doesn't happen again and i dont get a leaver buster again for that. I play the game on windows 10 if anybody has had the same problem like i have and knows the solution.

replies.body:
The [leaverbuster ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ)penalty would only occur after multiple leaves and not just one game.  Even if you feel this was beyond your control, leaves are treated the same because of the negative experience they cause.  The best way to resolve this is by solving whatever is causing this issue. 

With that, the issue you're experiencing is the result of a poor network connection that's unable to connect to the game server or download assets.  A repair wouldn't necessarily fix this if your game files are fine.   I suggest going over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot and get this fixed up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
Im not sure what the exact problem is though. do you think that downloading the hextech repair toll would help me figure out the problem? or could it solve the problem?
The hextech repair tool is versatile, and in this case it could help by automatically configuring your firewall settings.  That is one step that can help strengthen your connection!
Thx im gonna download it while i my client finishes fixing itself, just in case

It happened again today. I was on my last leaver buster game and it didn't load me in and the game got remade. Im pretty sure that it gave me another leaverbuster to. i used the hextech repair tool yesterday and it said everything was fine so ihave no clue what to do now. Im wondering if i could be my firewall, but im not sure.

Bummer!  No worries, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team and look into this for you.  You should have also received some logs with the Hextech Repair Tool, which you can add to your ticket for context.  We'll respond asap!
thx ill make sure to, but i used the hextech repair tool to reinstall the game to see if that works. if it doesnt ill definitly send the ticket

So I had a similar problem. So I I finish can select and got into the game but I can't do anything the game freezes my PC and my keyboard and mouse do nothing and the champs dont spawn in and nothing is happening if you have.this problem plz tell me I need to find out if it is lol or my pc

A recent windows update caused an issue with how the [Xbox Game Bar ](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) interacts with League.  Disabling that should fix you up!
